name: A Little Celebrity Crazy Hospital Surgeon Salon - A fun virtual doctor surgery office & clinic to cure cute patients for kids
name_original: A Little Celebrity Crazy Hospital Surgeon Salon - A fun virtual doctor surgery office & clinic to cure cute patients for kids
description:
Become a crazy doctor for kids celebrity today!

Diagnose and treat your patients injuries & ailments. Make sure you perform all the standard check-ups before you move on the your next patient!

* Optimized for iOS 8
* Available for iPhone 6 & iPhone 6 plus
